FilterItemPortable.Name: Aberto
FilterItemPortable.AdvancedFilterConditions: 1 E 2 E 3 E 4 E 5 E 6 E 7 E 8

FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>1=1 AND (A.STATUS NOT IN ('5')) AND (A.STATUS NOT IN ('3')) AND (A.STATUS NOT IN ('10')) AND (A.STATUS NOT IN ('9')) AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Oportunidades Atrasadas
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.DATAFECHAMENTO < @HOJE AND A.STATUS NOT IN (3,5,6,9,10)</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Responsável
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.STATUS NOT IN (3,5,9)</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
